page.title: 06Local news
page.content: The most tragic news that has happened in the area occured in January of this year,1985.A boy from a nearby village,against good advice went to the top of Croft hill with a large plastic bag.The snow was well compacted and allowed the boy to travel at a fast speed towards Huncote village.This was known as a dangerous route.The boy hit a trunk of a dead tree and broke both his skull and his neck.The boy died in hospital the same day. The Leicester Coritanians,a local athletic club,have decided to use once again Croft community centre for their annual roadrace.This proved such a success last year that the club once again wish to use the facilities.Many people from Croft and Stoney Stanton are expected to attend.There may well be famous "names" present.
